Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory262.png'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "It's just like what Asimov said. Even with a makeshift bionic terminal, the Spear of F.O.S. can act as a visual proxy for hacking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Well then, let's get working.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Looks like... I have the upper hand with the information I know right now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'This will eat into some of my resources, but this risk... is worth taking.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Playing around with the ID card in his hand, Murray opened the door and left the conference room.'}
{3: 'Right as he stepped out, his terminal beeped.'}
{3: '*Incoming unknown connection*'}
{3: 'Loading temporary record: VOCALTEXT39013...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'What follows is classified info.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'During Operation Acadia, we recovered a massive corpus of data through Gestalt for the operation of Babylonia and the rebuilding of human civilization.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'There were some data that were submitted in our logs, but cannot be found inside the database.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And with everything that Babylonia has been through since its conception, tracing where the files have gone has become immensely difficult.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'But enough about the past. The top priority right now is to retrieve the lost files.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "There are some data blocks that we didn't have the time to go through back then. I've attached their locations to this message. Please have a look.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "President Hassen, I'm not a direct subordinate of yours right now... Is it really appropriate to give me this kind of mission?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "You'd know best.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Working under Nikola has its advantages, which is why you joined him on the surface. No?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Just trying to move things in a better direction. It's what everyone would have done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Which is why I know you'd accept my mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "...What can I say? You see right through me, President Hassen. But the issue remainsâ€”I don't think I should learn of the info within these files.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'After all, I quite value my life.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'll tell you the end game... These files are the embers that can end this war.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Everything we've done has been to end the war, and these files can forward this objective immensely.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I don't think I have to remind you of the confidentiality level of these files.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Pardon me, but why not directly extract the files yourself? But rather, have me retrieve them first, then relay them to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'There are quite a few reasons, but none that should concern you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: '...President Hassen, you are just like Commander Nikola sometimes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I get that a lot.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Enough with the chit-chat. Time's ticking.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Once I express interest in these files, Nikola will certainly react immediately.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "If you think I'm like him, then you must also know what makes us different. Especially on our views about certain things.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'For this tiny sliver of hope, are you willing to take the risk?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "...Well, I don't think I have a choice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'In that case, good luck.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: '*Disconnected*'}
{3: 'Staring at the terminal monitor, Murray cannot help but sigh.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Hah. Our good President just handed down the thorniest mission like it's nothing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: '...But, this is an opportunity for me as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Seeing what's inside the core of Gestalt will help me prepare for the pieces in the future.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Clear about the mission?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Yes.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Then go.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Yes, sir.'}
{3: 'The commandant named Valeria steels herself and salutes Nikola, then leaves.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'As she steps out of the door, she motions to the empty space behind her to follow.'}
{3: 'The emptiness near the office distorts. A figure materializes out of thin air.'}
{3: 'Valeria continues. The figure follows.'}
